entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
